import React from "react"; import styles from "./ExtraStuff.module.css"; // Assuming you have a CSS module for styling import reliabilityCheckImg from "./reliability-check.jpg"; import ytfeature1 from "./yt-feature-1.png" import articlefeature1 from "./article-feature-2.jpeg" const ExtraStuff = () => { return (
{/* Section 1: Intro about reliability check */}

Check the reliability of news and fact-check information

In a world full of misinformation, it's crucial to verify news articles and videos before believing or sharing them. We make it easy to spot fake news and ensure you stay informed with accurate data.

{/* Section 2: Feature 1 - YouTube link transcription and fact-checking */}

Feature 1: YouTube Transcription and Fact-Checking

You can simply provide YouTube video links, and we transcribe the content, check the facts mentioned in the video, and give you a reliability percentage based on the information provided.

{/* Section 3: Feature 2 - News article link fact-checking */}

Feature 2: News Article Link Fact-Checking

Paste any news article link, and we'll scan the content to verify its authenticity, helping you understand whether the news is true or false.

{/* Section 4: Feature 3 - News article summarization */}

Feature 3: Summarize News Articles

Provide a link to any news article, and we'll summarize it for you, helping you grasp the essential information quickly and efficiently.

{/* Section 5: Why use TrueLive.ai */}

Why Use TrueLive.ai?

  • Fast, accurate fact-checking for news articles and videos
  • Summarizes lengthy news stories to save you time
  • Helps you stay informed with real-time news verification
  • Ensures that you only share reliable and truthful information
); }; export default ExtraStuff;
